Symbol.Script_3D:
! Horizontal Split Case Pump
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN END
IF GLOB_CONTEXT = 23 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 res = 24 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN res = 8 ! Simple
IF useSysMat THEN MainBoxMaterial = sMat MATERIAL MainBoxMaterial PEN gs_cont_pen RESOL res
! --- HORIZONTAL SPLIT CASE PUMP --- !
unID = 1 HOTSPOT -A/2, 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2, 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2, -B/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2, B/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2, B/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2, -B/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1
baseH = MIN(0.15*ZZYZX, 0.9*ConPosZ_1-flangeR1, 0.9*ConPosZ_2-flangeR2) IF baseH < 0.001 THEN baseH = 0.001 baseThk=0.15*baseH baseR = 0.1*baseH
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN ! Detailed
! Base ROTz 90 ROTx 90 ADDz -A/2 PRISM_ 12, A, -B/2, 0, 15, -B/2, baseH-baseR, 79, -B/2+baseR, baseH, 79, B/2-baseR, baseH, 79, B/2, baseH-baseR, 79, B/2, 0, 15, B/2-baseThk, 0, 15, B/2-baseThk, baseH-baseThk-baseR, 79, B/2-baseThk-baseR, baseH-baseThk, 79, -B/2+baseThk+baseR, baseH-baseThk, 79, -B/2+baseThk, baseH-baseThk-baseR, 79, -B/2+baseThk, 0, 15 DEL 3
ADD ConPosX_1, 0, houseH + houseR - houseR/6 PRISM_ 16,houseR/3, -0.7*houseLThk, 0.7*houseR, 79, -0.63*houseLThk, 0.7*houseR+hR/2, 79, -0.4*houseLThk, houseR+hR/6, 79, -houseThk/2+hR/2, houseR+hR/2, 79, houseThk/2-hR/2, houseR+hR/2, 79, 0.4*houseLThk, houseR+hR/6, 79, 0.63*houseLThk, 0.7*houseR+hR/2, 79, 0.7*houseLThk, 0.7*houseR, 79, 0.7*houseLThk, -0.7*houseR, 79, 0.63*houseLThk, -0.7*houseR-hR/2, 79, 0.4*houseLThk, -houseR-hR/6, 79, houseThk/2-hR/2, -houseR-hR/2, 79, -houseThk/2+hR/2, -houseR-hR/2, 79, -0.4*houseLThk, -houseR-hR/6, 79, -0.63*houseLThk, -0.7*houseR-hR/2, 79, -0.7*houseLThk, -0.7*houseR, 79 DEL 1
GROUP "pumpHouse1" ADD ConPosX_1, 0, houseH + houseR
ROTx 90 CUTPOLYA 4,1,0, -0.7*houseLThk, -houseR/6, 15, -0.7*houseLThk, houseR/6, 15, 0.7*houseLThk, houseR/6, 15, 0.7*houseLThk, -houseR/6, 15 DEL 1
REVOLVE 15,360, 1+2+4+8+16+32, -houseLThk, 0.2*houseR, 2, -0.9*houseLThk, 0.2*houseR, 2, -0.9*houseLThk, 0.6*houseR, 2, -0.7*houseLThk, 0.6*houseR, 2, -0.7*houseLThk, 0.7*houseR, 2,
-houseThk/2, 0.7*houseR, 2, -houseThk/2, houseR-hR, 1, -houseThk/2+hR, houseR, 1001, houseThk/2-hR, houseR, 1, houseThk/2, houseR-hR, 1002,
0.7*houseLThk, 0.7*houseR, 2, 0.7*houseLThk, 0.6*houseR, 2, 0.9*houseLThk, 0.6*houseR, 2, 0.9*houseLThk, 0.2*houseR, 2, houseLThk, 0.2*houseR, 2
CUTEND DEL 1 ENDGROUP
GROUP "pumpBase1" hBaseThk = 0.1*houseR ADDx ConPosX_1 FOR i=1 TO 2 ROTx 90 ROTy 90 IF i=1 THEN ROTy 90 ADDy ConPosZ_2 CUTPOLYA 2,1,0, 0,0, 979, pipeR2,360,4079 DEL 2 ENDIF IF i=2 THEN ROTy 90 ADDy ConPosZ_1 CUTPOLYA 2,1,0, 0,0, 979, pipeR1,360,4079 DEL 2 ENDIF ADDz -0.7*houseLThk PRISM 6, 1.4*houseLThk, -1.1*houseR, baseH, -1.1*houseR, baseH+hBaseThk, -0.9*houseR, baseH+hBaseThk, -0.73*houseR, houseH + houseR - houseR/6, -0.73*houseR+hBaseThk, houseH + houseR - houseR/6, -0.9*houseR+hBaseThk, baseH
CUTEND
DEL 3 MULy -1 NEXT i DEL 3 ENDGROUP
PLACEGROUP ADDGROUP("pumpHouse1", "pumpBase1") KILLGROUP "pumpHouse1" KILLGROUP "pumpBase1"
ADDz houseH + houseR ROTy 90 CUTPOLYA 2,1,0, 0,0,913, houseR,360,4013 DEL 2
ADD ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1 ROTz -90 REVOLVE 2,360,1+2+4+8+16+32, MAX(ABS(ConPosY_1), EPS), pipeR1, 2, 0, pipeR1, 2 DEL 2
ADD ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2, ConPosZ_2 ROTz 90 REVOLVE 2,360,1+2+4+8+16+32, MAX(ABS(ConPosY_2), EPS), pipeR2, 2, 0, pipeR2, 2 DEL 2
CUTEND
ADD ConPosX_1+houseLThk, 0, houseH + houseR REVOLVE 2,360, 1+2+4+8+16+32, 0, cupR, 2, cupL,cupR, 2
cupThk = 0.05*cupR basePosZ = houseH + houseR - baseH
ROTy 90 ROTz 90 ADDz -0.25*cupL PRISM_ 13,1.5*cupL, -2.2*cupR, -basePosZ + cupThk, 15, -1.5*cupR, 0, 79, 1.5*cupR, 0, 1079, 2.2*cupR, -basePosZ + cupThk, 15, 2.7*cupR, -basePosZ + cupThk, 15, 2.7*cupR, -basePosZ, 15, 2.2*cupR-cupThk, -basePosZ, 15, 1.5*cupR-cupThk, 0, 79, -1.5*cupR+cupThk, 0, 1079, -2.2*cupR+cupThk, -basePosZ, 15, -2.7*cupR, -basePosZ, 15, -2.7*cupR, -basePosZ + cupThk, 15, -2.7*cupR, -basePosZ + cupThk, 15 DEL 4
! Motor ADDx ConPosX_1+houseLThk+cupL ADDz houseH + houseR REVOLVE 8,360, 1+2+4+8+16+32, 0, 0.2*houseR, 2, 0.1*motorL, 0.2*houseR, 2, 0.1*motorL, motorR-mR, 1, 0.1*motorL+mR, motorR, 1001, 0.95*motorL-mR, motorR, 1, 0.95*motorL, motorR-mR, 1001, 0.95*motorL, 0.2*motorR, 2, motorL, 0.2*motorR, 2 DEL 1
mDepth = (0.95-0.1)*motorL mBaseThk = 0.05*motorR mBaseH = houseH + houseR - motorR - baseH
ADD (0.1+(0.95-0.1)/2)*motorL,motorR, baseH ROTx 90 PRISM_ 12, 2*motorR, -mDepth/2, 0, 15, -mDepth/2, mBaseH-baseR, 79, -mDepth/2+baseR, mBaseH, 79, mDepth/2-baseR, mBaseH, 79, mDepth/2, mBaseH-baseR, 79, mDepth/2, 0, 15, mDepth/2-mBaseThk, 0, 15, mDepth/2-mBaseThk, mBaseH-mBaseThk-baseR, 79, mDepth/2-mBaseThk-baseR, mBaseH-mBaseThk, 79, -mDepth/2+mBaseThk+baseR, mBaseH-mBaseThk, 79, -mDepth/2+mBaseThk, mBaseH-mBaseThk-baseR, 79, -mDepth/2+mBaseThk, 0, 15
DEL 3
ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN ! Simple
ROTz 90 ROTx 90 ADDz -A/2 PRISM_ 8, A, -B/2, 0, 15, -B/2, baseH, 15, B/2, baseH, 15, B/2, 0, 15, B/2-baseThk, 0, 15, B/2-baseThk, baseH-baseThk, 15, -B/2+baseThk, baseH-baseThk, 15, -B/2+baseThk, 0, 15 DEL 3
ADD ConPosX_1, 0, houseH + houseR - houseR/6 PRISM_ 8,houseR/3, -0.7*houseLThk, 0.7*houseR+hR/4, 79, -houseThk/2+hR/2, houseR+hR/2, 79, houseThk/2-hR/2, houseR+hR/2, 79, 0.7*houseLThk, 0.7*houseR+hR/4, 79,
0.7*houseLThk, -0.7*houseR-hR/4, 79, houseThk/2-hR/2, -houseR-hR/2, 79, -houseThk/2+hR/2, -houseR-hR/2, 79, -0.7*houseLThk, -0.7*houseR-hR/4, 79 DEL 1
GROUP "pumpHouse2" ADD ConPosX_1, 0, houseH + houseR
ROTx 90 CUTPOLYA 4,1,0, -0.7*houseLThk, -houseR/6, 15, -0.7*houseLThk, houseR/6, 15, 0.7*houseLThk, houseR/6, 15, 0.7*houseLThk, -houseR/6, 15 DEL 1
REVOLVE 15,360, 1+2+4+8+16+32, -houseLThk, 0.2*houseR, 2, -0.9*houseLThk, 0.2*houseR, 2, -0.9*houseLThk, 0.6*houseR, 2, -0.7*houseLThk, 0.6*houseR, 2, -0.7*houseLThk, 0.7*houseR, 2,
-houseThk/2, 0.7*houseR, 2, -houseThk/2, houseR-hR, 1, -houseThk/2+hR, houseR, 1001, houseThk/2-hR, houseR, 1, houseThk/2, houseR-hR, 1002,
0.7*houseLThk, 0.7*houseR, 2, 0.7*houseLThk, 0.6*houseR, 2, 0.9*houseLThk, 0.6*houseR, 2, 0.9*houseLThk, 0.2*houseR, 2, houseLThk, 0.2*houseR, 2
CUTEND DEL 1 ENDGROUP
GROUP "pumpBase2" hBaseThk = 0.1*houseR ADDx ConPosX_1 FOR i=1 TO 2 ROTx 90 ROTy 90 IF i=1 THEN ROTy 90 ADDy ConPosZ_2 CUTPOLYA 2,1,0, 0,0, 979, pipeR2,360,4079 DEL 2 ENDIF IF i=2 THEN ROTy 90 ADDy ConPosZ_1 CUTPOLYA 2,1,0, 0,0, 979, pipeR1,360,4079 DEL 2 ENDIF ADDz -0.7*houseLThk PRISM 6, 1.4*houseLThk, -1.1*houseR, baseH, -1.1*houseR, baseH+hBaseThk, -0.9*houseR, baseH+hBaseThk, -0.73*houseR, houseH + houseR - houseR/6, -0.73*houseR+hBaseThk, houseH + houseR - houseR/6, -0.9*houseR+hBaseThk, baseH
CUTEND
DEL 3 MULy -1 NEXT i DEL 3 ENDGROUP
PLACEGROUP ADDGROUP("pumpHouse2", "pumpBase2") KILLGROUP "pumpHouse2" KILLGROUP "pumpBase2"
ADDz houseH + houseR ROTy 90 CUTPOLYA 2,1,0, 0,0,913, houseR,360,4013 DEL 2
ADD ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1 ROTz -90 REVOLVE 2,360,1+2+4+8+16+32, 0, pipeR1, 2, ABS(ConPosY_1), pipeR1, 2 DEL 2
ADD ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2, ConPosZ_2 ROTz 90 REVOLVE 2,360,1+2+4+8+16+32, 0, pipeR2, 2, ABS(ConPosY_2), pipeR2, 2 DEL 2
CUTEND
ADD ConPosX_1+houseLThk, 0, houseH + houseR REVOLVE 2,360, 1+2+4+8+16+32, 0, cupR, 2, cupL,cupR, 2
cupThk = 0.05*cupR basePosZ = houseH + houseR - baseH
ROTy 90 ROTz 90 ADDz -0.25*cupL EXTRUDE 6, 0,0,1.5*cupL, 16+32, -2.7*cupR, -basePosZ, 0, -2.2*cupR, -basePosZ + cupThk, 0, -1.5*cupR, 0, 1, 1.5*cupR, 0, 1001, 2.2*cupR, -basePosZ + cupThk, 0, 2.7*cupR, -basePosZ, 0 DEL 4
! Motor ADDx ConPosX_1+houseLThk+cupL ADDz houseH + houseR REVOLVE 8,360, 1+2+4+8+16+32, 0, 0.2*houseR, 2, 0.1*motorL, 0.2*houseR, 2, 0.1*motorL, motorR-mR, 1, 0.1*motorL+mR, motorR, 1, 0.95*motorL-mR, motorR, 1, 0.95*motorL, motorR-mR, 1, 0.95*motorL, 0.2*motorR, 2, motorL, 0.2*motorR, 2 DEL 1
mDepth = (0.95-0.1)*motorL mBaseThk = 0.05*motorR mBaseH = houseH + houseR - motorR - baseH
ADD (0.1+(0.95-0.1)/2)*motorL,motorR, baseH ROTx 90 PRISM_ 8, 2*motorR, -mDepth/2, 0, 15, -mDepth/2, mBaseH, 15, mDepth/2, mBaseH, 15, mDepth/2, 0, 15, mDepth/2-mBaseThk, 0, 15, mDepth/2-mBaseThk, mBaseH-mBaseThk, 15, -mDepth/2+mBaseThk, mBaseH-mBaseThk, 15, -mDepth/2+mBaseThk, 0, 15
DEL 3
ENDIF DEL TOP RESOL res
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, cShow3D = 1, gs_ConMat = MainBoxMaterial, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1=ConPosZ_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 16, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConPosZ_2=ConPosZ_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConEdit_2 = 16 END
Symbol.Script_2D:
! Horizontal Split Case Pump
PEN gs_cont_pen SET FILL gs_fill_type
unID = 1 DrawingNum = 1 IF DrawingNum = 1 THEN ! Top
! --- HORIZONTAL SPLIT CASE PUMP --- !
HOTSPOT2 -A/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -A/2, -B/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -A/2, B/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A/2, B/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A/2, -B/2, unID: unID=unID+1
cupThk = 0.05*cupR ! IF GLOB_CONTEXT <> 22 THEN POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -A/2, -B/2, 1, -A/2, B/2, 1, A/2, B/2, 1, A/2, -B/2, 1
ADD2 ConPosX_1, 0 POLY2_B 16, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -0.7*houseLThk, 0.7*houseR, 1, -0.63*houseLThk, 0.7*houseR+hR/2, 1, -0.4*houseLThk, houseR+hR/6, 1, -houseThk/2+hR/2, houseR+hR/2, 1, houseThk/2-hR/2, houseR+hR/2, 1, 0.4*houseLThk, houseR+hR/6, 1, 0.63*houseLThk, 0.7*houseR+hR/2, 1, 0.7*houseLThk, 0.7*houseR, 0, 0.7*houseLThk, -0.7*houseR, 1, 0.63*houseLThk, -0.7*houseR-hR/2, 1, 0.4*houseLThk, -houseR-hR/6, 1, houseThk/2-hR/2, -houseR-hR/2, 1, -houseThk/2+hR/2, -houseR-hR/2, 1, -0.4*houseLThk, -houseR-hR/6, 1, -0.63*houseLThk, -0.7*houseR-hR/2, 1, -0.7*houseLThk, -0.7*houseR, 0
POLY2_B 33, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -houseLThk, 0.2*houseR, 1, -0.9*houseLThk, 0.2*houseR, 1, -0.9*houseLThk, 0.6*houseR, 1, -0.7*houseLThk, 0.6*houseR, 1, -0.7*houseLThk, 0.7*houseR, 1,
-houseThk/2, 0.7*houseR, 1, -houseThk/2, houseR-hR, 1, -houseThk/2+hR, houseR, 1001, houseThk/2-hR, houseR, 1, houseThk/2, houseR-hR, 1001, houseThk/2, 0.7*houseR, 1,
0.7*houseLThk, 0.7*houseR, 1, 0.7*houseLThk, 0.6*houseR, 1, 0.9*houseLThk, 0.6*houseR, 1, 0.9*houseLThk, 0.2*houseR, 1, houseLThk, 0.2*houseR, 1,
houseLThk, -0.2*houseR, 1, 0.9*houseLThk, -0.2*houseR, 1, 0.9*houseLThk, -0.6*houseR, 1, 0.7*houseLThk, -0.6*houseR, 1, 0.7*houseLThk, -0.7*houseR, 1, houseThk/2, -0.7*houseR, 1, houseThk/2, -houseR+hR, 1, 0,-1,801, houseThk/2-hR, -houseR, 1001, -houseThk/2+hR, -houseR, 1, -houseThk/2, -houseR+hR, 1001, -houseThk/2, -0.7*houseR, 1,
-0.7*houseLThk, -0.7*houseR, 1, -0.7*houseLThk, -0.6*houseR, 1, -0.9*houseLThk, -0.6*houseR, 1, -0.9*houseLThk, -0.2*houseR, 1, -houseLThk, -0.2*houseR, 1
LINE2 -0.9*houseLThk, 0.2*houseR, -0.9*houseLThk, -0.2*houseR LINE2 -0.7*houseLThk, 0.6*houseR, -0.7*houseLThk, -0.6*houseR LINE2 -houseThk/2, 0.7*houseR, -houseThk/2, -0.7*houseR LINE2 0.9*houseLThk, 0.2*houseR, 0.9*houseLThk, -0.2*houseR LINE2 0.7*houseLThk, 0.6*houseR, 0.7*houseLThk, -0.6*houseR LINE2 houseThk/2, 0.7*houseR, houseThk/2, -0.7*houseR DEL 1
IF ConWidth_1 < 0.001 THEN ConWidth_1 = 0.001 ADD2 ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1 ROT2 -90 POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, ConWidth_1/2, 1, MAX(ABS(ConPosY_1), EPS)-houseR-hR/2, ConWidth_1/2, 1, MAX(ABS(ConPosY_1), EPS)-houseR-hR/2, -ConWidth_1/2, 1, 0, -ConWidth_1/2, 0 DEL 2
IF ConWidth_2 < 0.001 THEN ConWidth_2 = 0.001 ADD2 ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2 ROT2 90 POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, ConWidth_2/2, 1, MAX(ABS(ConPosY_2), EPS)-houseR-hR/2, ConWidth_2/2, 1, MAX(ABS(ConPosY_2), EPS)-houseR-hR/2, -ConWidth_2/2, 1, 0, -ConWidth_2/2, 0 DEL 2
ADD2 ConPosX_1+houseLThk+0.5*cupL,0 POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -0.75*cupL,-2.7*cupR, 1, -0.75*cupL, 2.7*cupR, 1, 0.75*cupL, 2.7*cupR, 1, 0.75*cupL,-2.7*cupR, 1 LINE2 -0.75*cupL, 2.2*cupR+cupThk, 0.75*cupL, 2.2*cupR+cupThk LINE2 -0.75*cupL,-2.2*cupR+cupThk, 0.75*cupL,-2.2*cupR+cupThk DEL 1
ADD2 ConPosX_1+houseLThk+cupL, 0 POLY2_B 16, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0.25*cupL, 0.2*houseR, 1, 0.1*motorL, 0.2*houseR, 1, 0.1*motorL, motorR-mR, 1, 0.1*motorL+mR, motorR, 1001, 0.95*motorL-mR, motorR, 1, 0.95*motorL, motorR-mR, 1001, 0.95*motorL, 0.2*motorR, 1, motorL, 0.2*motorR, 1,
motorL, -0.2*motorR, 1, 0.95*motorL, -0.2*motorR, 1, 0.95*motorL, -motorR+mR, 1, 0.95*motorL-mR, -motorR, 1001, 0.1*motorL+mR, -motorR, 1, 0.1*motorL, -motorR+mR, 1001, 0.1*motorL, -0.2*houseR, 1, 0.25*cupL, -0.2*houseR, 1 LINE2 0.1*motorL, 0.2*houseR, 0.1*motorL, -0.2*houseR LINE2 0.95*motorL, 0.2*motorR, 0.95*motorL, -0.2*motorR DEL 1 ! ENDIF ENDIF
! --- OTHER VIEWS --- !
DEL TOP ROT2 (SYMB_MIRRORED - NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED)) * (DrawingNum > 1) * SYMB_ROTANGLE
IF DrawingNum = 2 THEN PROJECT2 -3, 90, 2 ! Bottom IF DrawingNum = 3 THEN PROJECT2 4, 270, 2 ! Front IF DrawingNum = 4 THEN PROJECT2 4, 90, 2 ! Back IF DrawingNum = 5 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180 * SYMB_MIRRORED, 2 ! Right IF DrawingNum = 6 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180 * NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED), 2 ! Left
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, DrawingNum = DrawingNum, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type=gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen=gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen=gs_back_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdgeVisible_1 = 0, ConEdit_1 = 15, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConEdgeVisible_2 = 0, ConEdit_2 = 15 DEL 1
END
Symbol.Script_1D:
! Horizontal Split Case Pump
EPS = 0.0001
! --- HARDCODED AND DERIVED VARIABLES --- !
maxCW = MIN(ABS(ConPosY_1), ABS(ConPosY_2))
IF ConWidth_1<0.005 THEN ConWidth_1=0.005 PARAMETERS ConWidth_1=0.005 ENDIF IF ConWidth_1>maxCW THEN ConWidth_1=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_1=maxCW ENDIF IF ConWidth_2<0.005 THEN ConWidth_2=0.005 PARAMETERS ConWidth_2=0.005 ENDIF IF ConWidth_2>maxCW THEN ConWidth_2=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_2=maxCW ENDIF
pipeR1 = 0.52*ConWidth_1 IF pipeR1 < 0.001 THEN pipeR1 = 0.001 flangeR1 = 0.8*ConWidth_1 flangeThk1 = 0.15*flangeR1
pipeR2 = 0.52*ConWidth_2 IF pipeR2 < 0.001 THEN pipeR2 = 0.001 flangeR2 = 0.8*ConWidth_2 flangeThk2 = 0.15*flangeR2
houseR = MIN(ABS(ConPosY_1)-flangeThk1, ABS(ConPosY_2)-flangeThk2, 0.30*B) IF houseR < 0.001 THEN houseR = 0.001 hR = 0.25*houseR houseThk = MAX(2*hR+EPS, 2*MAX(pipeR1, pipeR2) + hR) houseLThk = A/2+ConPosX_1
cupR = houseR/3 cupL = houseThk/2
motorR = 0.8*houseR motorL = A/2-ConPosX_1-houseLThk-cupL IF motorL < 0.001 THEN motorL = 0.001 mR=0.1*motorR
houseH = MIN(ConPosZ_1-pipeR1, ConPosZ_2-pipeR2) IF houseH < 0.001 THEN houseH = 0.001
z = 0
PARAMETERS ac_toplevel = z PARAMETERS ac_bottomlevel = z
Symbol.Script_UI:
! Horizontal Split Case Pump
UI_DIALOG `Специальные Параметры MEP`
DIM ui_vis_attr[4][4] FOR i = 1 TO 4 FOR j = 1 TO 4 ui_vis_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_vis_attr[1][1] = 2 ui_vis_attr[1][2] = 1 ui_vis_attr[1][3] = 7
ui_vis_attr[2][1] = 1 ui_vis_attr[2][2] = 237 ui_vis_attr[2][3] = 68 ui_vis_attr[2][4] = 14
DIM ui_con_type[2] ui_con_type[1] = 0 ui_con_type[2] = 0
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS ALL ui_vis_attr = ui_vis_attr, ui_centerline_vars = 0, ui_con_type = ui_con_type, ui_system_var_pos = 2, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
Symbol.Script_VL:
! Horizontal Split Case Pump
call "FM_types_MEP" parameters DIM shape_typ_to_validation[3] shape_typ_to_validation[1] = 0 ! Rectangle shape_typ_to_validation[2] = 1 ! Circle shape_typ_to_validation[3] = 0 ! Oval
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" OR gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m ELSE IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Детальный` PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D = gs_detlevel_3D ENDIF
VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D" `Детальный`,`Простой`,`Откл.` VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, 1, 0
! --- MAIN PARAMETERS --- !
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN minW = 4*MAX(ConWidth_1, ConWidth_2) VALUES "A" RANGE [minW,] IF A<minW THEN A=minW PARAMETERS A=minW ENDIF
minD = 2*MAX(ConWidth_1, ConWidth_2) VALUES "B" RANGE [minD,] IF B<minD THEN B=minD PARAMETERS B=minD ENDIF
minH = 2*MAX(ConWidth_1, ConWidth_2) VALUES "ZZYZX" RANGE [minH,] IF ZZYZX<minH THEN ZZYZX=minH PARAMETERS ZZYZX=minH ENDIF ENDIF
! --- OBJECT SPECIFIC PARAMETERS --- !
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN ZZYZX = houseH + 2 * houseR PARAMETERS ZZYZX = ZZYZX LOCK "ZZYZX"
minX = -0.4*A maxX = -0.1*A minY = 0 minZ = ConWidth_1 maxZ = ZZYZX VALUES "ConPosX_1" RANGE[minX,maxX] VALUES "ConPosY_1" RANGE[minY,] VALUES "ConPosZ_1" RANGE[minZ,maxZ] IF ConPosX_1<minX THEN ConPosX_1=minX PARAMETERS ConPosX_1=minX ENDIF IF ConPosX_1>maxX THEN ConPosX_1=maxX PARAMETERS ConPosX_1=maxX ENDIF IF ConPosY_1<minY THEN ConPosY_1=minY PARAMETERS ConPosY_1=minY ENDIF IF ConPosZ_1<minZ THEN ConPosZ_1=minZ PARAMETERS ConPosZ_1=minZ ENDIF IF ConPosZ_1>maxZ THEN ConPosZ_1=maxZ PARAMETERS ConPosZ_1=maxZ ENDIF
minX = -0.4*A maxX = -0.1*A maxY = 0 minZ = ConWidth_2 maxZ = ZZYZX VALUES "ConPosX_2" RANGE[minX,maxX] VALUES "ConPosY_2" RANGE[,maxY] VALUES "ConPosZ_2" RANGE[minZ,maxZ] IF ConPosX_2<minX THEN ConPosX_2=minX PARAMETERS ConPosX_2=minX ENDIF IF ConPosX_2>maxX THEN ConPosX_2=maxX PARAMETERS ConPosX_2=maxX ENDIF IF ConPosY_2>maxY THEN ConPosY_2=maxY PARAMETERS ConPosY_2=maxY ENDIF IF ConPosZ_2<minZ THEN ConPosZ_2=minZ PARAMETERS ConPosZ_2=minZ ENDIF IF ConPosZ_2>maxZ THEN ConPosZ_2=maxZ PARAMETERS ConPosZ_2=maxZ ENDIF
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConPosX_1" THEN ConPosX_2 = ConPosX_1 PARAMETERS ConPosX_2 = ConPosX_2 ENDIF IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConPosX_2" THEN ConPosX_1 = ConPosX_2 PARAMETERS ConPosX_1 = ConPosX_1 ENDIF diffR = (ConWidth_1-ConWidth_2)/2 IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConPosZ_1" THEN ConPosZ_2 = ConPosZ_1-diffR PARAMETERS ConPosZ_2 = ConPosZ_2 ENDIF IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConPosZ_2" THEN ConPosZ_1 = ConPosZ_2+diffR PARAMETERS ConPosZ_1 = ConPosZ_1 ENDIF ENDIF
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
PARAMETERS MEP_NumberConnections = 2
! --- 1st CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 1 ConName = `Труба Впускного Соединения `
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 1 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = -1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN maxCW = MIN(ABS(ConPosY_1), ABS(ConPosY_2)) IF maxCW < 0.006 THEN maxCW = 0.006
VALUES "ConLength_1" RANGE [0,] VALUES "ConWidth_1" RANGE [0.005, maxCW] VALUES "ConDepth_1" RANGE [0.005, maxCW]
IF ConWidth_1<0.005 THEN ConWidth_1=0.005 PARAMETERS ConWidth_1=0.005 ENDIF IF ConWidth_1>maxCW THEN ConWidth_1=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_1=maxCW ENDIF ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_1, ConPosY = ConPosY_1, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_1, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_1, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_1, ConWidth = ConWidth_1, ConDepth = ConDepth_1, ConLength = ConLength_1, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_1, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_1, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_1, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_1, ConToolType = ConToolType_1, ConStatus = ConStatus_1, ConType_1 = ConType_1, ConConnectorType_1 = ConConnectorType_1, ConSystem_1 = ConSystem_1, ui_page_idx = ui_page_idx, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_1, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- 2nd CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 2 ConName = `Труба Выпускного Соединения`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = -1 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN maxCW = MIN(ABS(ConPosY_1), ABS(ConPosY_2)) IF maxCW < 0.006 THEN maxCW = 0.006
VALUES "ConLength_2" RANGE [0,] VALUES "ConWidth_2" RANGE [0.005, maxCW] VALUES "ConDepth_2" RANGE [0.005, maxCW]
IF ConWidth_2<0.005 THEN ConWidth_2=0.005 PARAMETERS ConWidth_2=0.005 ENDIF IF ConWidth_2>maxCW THEN ConWidth_2=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_2=maxCW ENDIF ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_2, ConPosY = ConPosY_2, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_2, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_2, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_2, ConWidth = ConWidth_2, ConDepth = ConDepth_2, ConLength = ConLength_2, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_2, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_2, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_2, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_2, ConToolType = ConToolType_2, ConStatus = ConStatus_2, ConType_2 = ConType_2, ConConnectorType_2 = ConConnectorType_2, ConSystem_2 = ConSystem_2, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_2, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
IF setProgram THEN SetProgram = 0 PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram ENDIF
